entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 late in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
